title: 论坛无法修改帖子bug
author: 吊打小逗比
txt_content:
想修改我发布的帖子，修改后保存出现500错误码，具体如下
500 Internal Server ErrorThe server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=post&action=edit&extra=&editsubmit=yesServer:mc-slbDate:2017/01/31 19:13:31Powered by Tengine

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wujinze 于 2017-2-1 22:08 编辑 

多提交几次试试,论坛是几组服务器组成的,有可能只是一组炸了=-=
